label: no search, sort or pagination
tests: Confirm there is no pagination feature
Confirm there is no sort feature
Confirm there is no search option

label: Pagination only
tests: Confirm > pagination arrows link data records to the next page
Confirm < pagination arrows link data records to the previous page
Confirm pagination >> double arrows link data to the last pages of the data record
Confirm pagination << double arrows link data to the first pages of the data record

label: Search only
tests: Confirm there is no sort feature
Confirm there are no pagination links
Confirm user can search for data in the listing

label: Sort only
tests: Confirm there is no search feature
Confirm there are no pagination links
Confirm user can sort data

label: Pagination and search (no sort)
tests: Confirm there is no sort feature
Confirm pagination links are functioning
Confirm user can search for data in the data listing

label: Pagination and sort (no search)
tests: Confirm there is no search feature
Confirm pagination links are functioning
Confirm user can sort data in the data listing

label: Search and sort (no pagination)
tests: Confirm there are no pagination links
Confirm user can search for data in the data listing
Confirm user can sort data in the data listing

label: Search, sort and pagination active
tests: Confirm pagination links are functioning
Confirm user can search the data listing
Confirm user can sort the data
